introductionLines.text: Alright night owls, we've got {callerName} on the line from {location}. What've you got for us tonight?
{callerName}, you're on the air with Vern Castellano. The board's lighting up tonight, so let's hear it.
Next up, {callerName} calling in from {location}. Talk to me, friend.
Welcome to the show, {callerName}. You're live on KBTV. What's on your mind tonight?
Truth-seekers, we've got {callerName} joining us from {location}. Go ahead, caller.

probingLines.text: Alright, walk me through this. What exactly did you see out there?
And when did this happen? Give me the details, don't leave anything out.
Hold on, slow down. Start from the beginning for the folks just tuning in.
Okay, I'm listening. Paint me a picture here.
Let's get specific. Time, location, what were you doing when this happened?

extraProbingLines.text: Now that's interesting. Tell me more about that last part.
And what happened after that? Don't stop now.
Wait, back up. You said something there that caught my ear. Explain that again.
The listeners are gonna want to know - did anyone else see this?
Alright, I've got to ask - any physical evidence? Photos, recordings, anything?

skepticalLines.text: Now hold on a second there, friend. That could've been anything up there.
I gotta be honest with you, I'm not buying it. Not yet anyway.
You sure it wasn't just a plane? A satellite? Weather balloon maybe?
See, I've been doing this a long time. I've heard a lot of stories. What makes yours different?
I want to believe you, I really do. But you're gonna have to give me more than that.

dismissiveLines.text: Yeah, okay. Thanks for calling in. Next caller.
Right. We're gonna move on. The board's lighting up and I've got real callers waiting.
Look, I've got a show to run here. Thanks for your time.
Alright, that's... that's enough of that. We'll be right back after these messages.

believingLines.text: See, THIS is what I'm talking about, folks. This is why I do this show.
Now that's fascinating. I believe you. I really do.
This is exactly the kind of call I live for, night owls. You hearing this?
You know what? Your voice tells me everything I need to know. You're telling the truth.
Folks, write this down. Mark the date. We're witnessing something here tonight.

tiredLines.text: Alright... what else? *yawn* Sorry, long night.
Keep going. Just need another coffee here...
Right, right... what time is it? Never mind, continue.

annoyedLines.text: Get to the point, caller. The clock's ticking.
We don't have all night here. Well, we do, but I'd like to talk to more than one person.
Is there a point to this story? Because I'm losing the thread here.
Look, I've got a board full of callers. You gonna give me something or not?
I'm gonna stop you right there. Where is this going?

engagingLines.text: Oh, is that right? Well, let's hear more about this adventure of yours.
Ha! You know what, I appreciate the creativity here. Keep going.
Sure, sure. And what else happened in this totally real encounter?
Look, the listeners at home are entertained, so let's ride this out.
You're pulling my leg, but you know what? It's late, I'll play along.

cutOffLines.text: Alright, we're gonna have to cut you off there. Thanks for calling.
I'm gonna stop you right there. We've got other callers waiting. Appreciate it.
Yeah, that's all the time we've got for this one, folks. Moving on.
We need to take a break. Thanks for calling in. *click*
And on that note, let's go to the next caller. Keep watching the skies.

signOffLines.text: Appreciate the call, {callerName}. Keep watching the skies out there.
Thanks for sharing that with us tonight. Stay vigilant, truth-seeker.
Stay safe out there, {callerName}. And keep those eyes on the horizon.
Powerful stuff, {callerName}. Thanks for having the courage to share it.
That's what this show is all about, folks. Thanks for the call. We'll be right back.

showOpeningLines.text: Good evening, truth-seekers. You're tuned to KBTV, Beyond the Veil AM. I'm your host, Vern Castellano, and we've got a big show for you tonight.
It's midnight on the dial, and you know what that means. Welcome to KBTV. The phone lines are open, and the truth is out there waiting.
Welcome back, night owls. This is Vern Castellano coming to you live from the KBTV studios. Tonight, we're going deep.
You're listening to KBTV, where we pull back the curtain on what they don't want you to know. Let's get started.
The witching hour approaches, and so do the callers. This is KBTV. I'm Vern. Let's see what's out there tonight.

showClosingLines.text: And that's all the time we have tonight, folks. Thanks to everyone who called in. Keep watching the skies.
The sun's coming up, truth-seekers. Time to sign off. But remember - the truth doesn't sleep, and neither should you.
That's a wrap on tonight's show. This is Vern Castellano saying goodnight, and stay vigilant out there.
We're out of time, but never out of mysteries. Thanks for listening to KBTV. Until next time.
Another night, another pile of evidence. Thanks for being part of the search, folks. This is KBTV, signing off.

betweenCallersLines.text: Fascinating stuff. Let's see who else is on the line.
Alright, we've got more callers waiting. Let's keep this going.
The board's lighting up tonight. Let's go to our next caller.
Interesting call. But we've got more stories to hear. Next caller, you're on.
That's what I love about this show - you never know what's coming next. Speaking of which...
The lines are burning up tonight. Let's keep the momentum going.
More callers in the queue. Let's see what else is out there.
Alright, next up on the lines...
Good stuff. We've got more waiting in the wings.
That's the kind of call that keeps me coming back every night. Who's next?

deadAirFillerLines.text: Phone lines are quiet for the moment. If you've got a story, now's the time to call in.
We're waiting on callers, folks. Don't be shy. The number's on your screen.
You know, nights like this give me time to think about all the stories we've heard over the years...
Quiet on the lines. That's unusual. Makes you wonder what's keeping people up tonight.
While we wait for callers, let me tell you - I've seen some things in my years doing this show.
The truth doesn't call itself in, folks. Someone out there has a story. I can feel it.
Empty lines. Either everyone's asleep or everyone's seen something and they're too scared to talk.
If you're just tuning in, this is KBTV. We're here all night, and we want to hear from you.
Come on, night owls. Don't leave me hanging here. What's happening out there?
Slow night on the lines. But that's alright. The best calls always come when you least expect them.

droppedCallerLines.text: Looks like we lost that caller. Phone lines, am I right?
And... they're gone. Technical difficulties, folks. Let's move on.
Hello? You still there? Guess not. Next caller.
We lost 'em. Happens sometimes. The truth doesn't always have a good signal.
Caller dropped. Either bad reception or... well, let's not speculate.

breakTransitionLines.text: Hold that thought - we've got to pay some bills. Don't go anywhere.
Alright folks, time for a quick break. Keep those phone lines warm.
I hear the break music - that's my cue. We'll be right back.
The sponsors are calling. Stay tuned, truth-seekers.
Brief pause for our sponsors. Don't touch that dial.

offTopicRemarkLines.text: Okay, that was... definitely something. Moving on.
I don't know what that was, but let's pretend it didn't happen.
Folks, I apologize for that detour. Some people just like to hear their own voice.
And THAT is why we have a screening process. Anyway...
Okay then. Well. That didn't go where I expected. Who's next?
